notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.body: The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist, may have been moved, or the URL might be mistyped. You can go back, head to the homepage, or try a different language.

goHome.text: Visit the homepage to continue browsing.
goHome.label: Go to homepage

changeLocale.text: Switch the site language to see if this content exists elsewhere.
changeLocale.label: Change language
